item.description:
1. Newborn vitamin D deficiency linked to higher risk of ADHD, schizophrenia and autism  Medical Xpress
  2. Babies born with vitamin D deficiency at higher risk of mental disorders, new study finds  Australian Broadcasting Corporation
  3. Understanding links: Babies with low vitamin D may have high risk of mental disorders  The Australian
  4. Early vitamin D deficiency increases risk of ADHD, schizophrenia and autism  News-Medical
